Instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Poke sweet potatoes multiple times with a fork. Microwave on High for 5 minutes. Turn them over and continue cooking until they can be easily pierced with a fork, about 3 to 5 additional minutes; let cool. Remove the skin and cut the sweet potatoes into large pieces.
Mash the garbanzo beans in a bowl using a fork or potato masher.
Combine sweet potatoes and egg with the mashed garbanzo beans, mixing until smooth.
Fold in the cheese and cilantro into the dough until combined.
Roll the dough into 1-inch spheres and arrange them on the greased baking sheet. Gently press the balls down to form patties.
Bake in the preheated oven until they are golden brown, approximately 30 minutes, turning them after 15 minutes.
